summary: Superman costume for Skyrim, includes suit, cape and boots, Standalone mod, needs only an updated version of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Superman costume for Skyrim.
This mod adds a Superman costume, complete with suit, cape and boots to your game.

Characteristics:
The parts are craftable under the "Leather" tab.
Male only
Enchanted
Light Armor

I edited the Dark Brotherhood armor's Color and Normal maps, removing the DB symbols and some unnecessary details and adding Superman's symbol and some other  details. It's an add-on, not a replacement.

This is only my second upload and the first with edited meshes/textures, I hope you find it useful.

Credits:
Bethesda for the DB armor mesh and textures
Cloaks of Skyrim mod for the cape - I highly recommend this mod, I cannot even imagine my Skyrim game without it anymore.
For the screenshots:
Face Light
RS Children Overhaul
Tannick  ECE preset
Flight Mod
KS Hairdos Renewal
Bethesda for the Skyrim Game and the Creation Kit.
DC Comkics for the Superman character.
author: JohnJrFF
